0		9876543210
Format x24 - 24 bit(s) 0
AE_TRUNCA32Q48 00100101 00110100
r 3210
ae_fld_dr_to_ar_v0 3210

Assembler Syntax

AE_TRUNCA32Q48 a0..15(arr), aed0..15(ae_dr_to_ar_v0)

C Syntax

#include <xtensa/tie/xt_hifi2.h>

extern int AE_TRUNCA32Q48(ae_q56s d0);

Description

AE_TRUNCA32Q48 truncates a 17.47 AE_DR fraction d0 to a 32-bit (1.31) AR fraction in a. The 16 MSB s and the 16 LSBs of the input 64-bit value are discarded.

Implementation Pipeline

In Out
ae_dr_to_ar_v0 Mstage arr Mstage

Protos that use AE_TRUNCA32Q48

proto AE_TRUNCA32Q48 { out int32 a, in ae_q56s d0 }{}{
AE_TRUNCA32Q48 a, d0;
}
